latestNews.title: Adesanya Offers Simple Gameplan For Costa Fight
latestNews.description: UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya shares his simple gameplan for his upcoming grudge match with undefeated contender Paulo Costa at UFC 253.
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: Report: Cody Garbrandt stricken with coronavirus ahead of UFC 255 title fight
latestNews.description: To see an updated list of positive coronavirus cases click here.
latestNews.author: Jesse Holland

latestNews.title: Dana White confirms Jorge Masvidal will defend ‘BMF’ belt against Nate Diaz
latestNews.description: UFC President Dana White confirmed that Jorge Masvidal will defend his "BMF" belt against welterweight rival Nate Diaz when they run it back in January 2021.
latestNews.author: Jesse Holland

latestNews.title: Highlights! OSP Starches Menifield With One Punch
latestNews.description: Watch UFC Vegas 9 full fight video highlights: Ovince Saint Preux vs. Alonzo Menifield earlier tonight (Sat., Sept. 5, 2020) live on ESPN+ from Las Vegas, featuring the third-round knockout finish by "OSP."
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: Overeem Unfazed By Potential Lesnar Return: ‘Who Cares About Brock’
latestNews.description: Alistair Overeem discusses a potential return of Brock Lesnar ahead of his main event clash with Augusto Sakai this weekend at UFC Vegas 9.
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: Coach: Miocic Would ‘Shut Down’ Jones On The Feet
latestNews.description: Stipe Miocic’s head coach believes the UFC champ would dominate Jon Jones on the feet in a potential clash at heavyweight.
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: Conor McGregor fails to crack Top 50 on Forbes ‘Highest Paid’ chart, claims ‘Proper’ list puts him at No. 1
latestNews.description: Former UFC lightweight champion Conor McGregor claims his Proper No. 12 Whiskey label puts him ahead of Kylie Jenner on Forbes "Highest Paid Celebrities" list.
latestNews.author: Jesse Holland

latestNews.title: TJ Dillashaw tried to panic UFC bantamweight division, got shut down by ‘Funkmaster’ instead
latestNews.description: TJ Dillashaw UFC return is just around the corner but top-ranked bantamweights like Aljamain Sterling don’t sound too worried about his "old tricks."
latestNews.author: Jesse Holland

latestNews.title: Highlights! Overeem Hands Sakai First Knockout Loss
latestNews.description: Watch UFC Vegas 9 full fight video highlights: Alistair Overeem vs. Augusto Sakai last night (Sat., Sept. 5, 2020) live on ESPN+ from Las Vegas, featuring the fifth-round knockout finish by "The Reem."
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: NSAC Suspends Four UFC Fighters For Failed Drug Tests
latestNews.description: Tim Elliott, Jamahal Hill, Luis Pena and Deron Winn were all suspended by the Nevada State Athletic Commission (NSAC) on Thursday for failing drug tests.
latestNews.author: Adam Guillen Jr.

latestNews.title: Biggest Winners, Loser For UFC Vegas 9
latestNews.description: UFC on ESPN 9 results: It’s time to see who were the biggest winners (and loser) from last night’s (Sat., Sept. 5, 2020) event in Las Vegas, Nevada.
latestNews.author: Adam Guillen Jr.

latestNews.title: Jon Jones hits the weight room as heavyweight preparations begin
latestNews.description: The former light heavyweight champion is back to weight lifting as he prepares for a run at UFC’s heavyweight title.
latestNews.author: Ryan Harkness

latestNews.title: Brock vs Fedor odds: Lesnar favored to beat Emelianenko in Bellator (or UFC) super fight
latestNews.description: Brock Lesnar odds put the former UFC heavyweight champion as the betting favorite over Bellator MMA standout Fedor Emelianenko.
latestNews.author: Jesse Holland

latestNews.title: OSP ‘Upset’ After Not Getting Paid For Recent COVID-19 Withdrawal
latestNews.description: Ovince Saint Preux is not happy that he wasn’t paid for UFC on ESPN 15 last month after getting pulled from the card due to a positive COVID-19 test.
latestNews.author: Dan Hiergesell

latestNews.title: Pereira Slaps, Strangles Imadaev
latestNews.description: UFC Vegas 9 results live: Michel Pereira vs. Zelim Imadaev full fight recap of Middleweight main card bout tonight (Sat., Sept. 5, 2020) from inside UFC APEX in Las Vegas, Nevada, featuring a dominant performance from Pereira.
latestNews.author: Andrew Richardson

latestNews.title: Dominick Reyes wasn’t impressed with UFC Vegas 7’s ‘lame’ main event
latestNews.description: With Jon Jones gone from light heavyweight, Dominick Reyes has picked up the mantle of division Twitter trash talker.
latestNews.author: Ryan Harkness

latestNews.title: Overeem: It Would Be An Honor To Welcome Jones To Heavyweight
latestNews.description: Despite training with Jon Jones in the past, Alistair Overeem says it would be an honor for him to welcome "Bones" to the Heavyweight division.
latestNews.author: Adam Guillen Jr.
